extendedInfo.description: Discover wholesome, high-quality Panera BreadÂ® menu items with detailed nutrition facts.* No ads.* No permissions.* Works offline or in Airplane Mode.---It is easy to find something healthy and nutritious at Panera BreadÂ®. Choosing what to eat from Panera's wonderful menu is much harder. ^^ The aroma of fresh-baked artisan breads and bakery items will help you decide... well, until you see the great selection of cafÃ© items and drinks.Panera BreadÂ® makes a great part of your daily routine, whether it is a relaxing breakfast or a working lunch. Now, you have the nutrition facts in the palm of your hand to help you meet your health and wellness goals.Beta testers love that this app works offline or in Airplane Mode. While everyone else is dealing with mobile network congestion during peak hours, you are already browsing menu items with a few taps. The ability to work offline or in Airplane mode provides flexibility for impromptu meal planning. ^^* Perfect app if you count calories* Shows calories, fats, protein, carbs and more* Works on tablets of all sizes* Simple design minimizes app size* Conserves battery life (no Web access needed)Menu Categories:* Artisan Breads* Specialty Breads* Bagels* Flavorful Cream Cheese Spreads* Artisan Pastries* Brownies* Cookies* Cakes* Muffins and Muffies* Scones* Specialty Pastries* Sweet Rolls* Baked Egg SoufflÃ©s* Grilled Breakfast Sandwiches* Breakfast Favorites* Hot Panini* Signature Sandwiches* Cafe Sandwiches* Soups* Pasta* Hand-Tossed Salads* Dressings* Frozen Drinks* Iced Drinks* Espresso Drinks* Hot Drinks* Drinks* Panera Kidsâ¢* Sides* Hidden MenuEach food menu item provides: * Serving Size * Calories * Total Fat (g) * Saturated Fat (g) * Trans Fat (g) * Cholesterol (mg) * Sodium (mg) * Carbs (g) * Fiber (g) * Sugars (g) * Protein (g)Thank you for downloading this app!* Feedback is greatly appreciated.* Please send bug reports and suggestions by email.PLEASE NOTE: This app is not affiliated with Panera BreadÂ® or any Panera LLC franchises. Nutrition facts and/or menu items are subject to change without prior notice.

reviews.title: Simple, effective app
reviews.comment: Lightweight, works well, no weird permissions. Good for people on diets or people with dietary restrictions.
reviews.author: Kyle Palmateer
